channel.title: Salt Lake City on Hanna

item.title: Salt Lake City, Utah
item.description: Salt Lake City was the final stop on what turned into the #summerofviews, and it did not disappoint! This city has a lively downtown area and quick access to outdoor adventure on every level. WHERE TO STAY Of the few hostels in the SLC area, none of them seem to have their act together.
